description: Application under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for amendments to condition 29 (highway works) of planning permission 2020/0636 dated 2 September 2021 ("Demolition of existing building and multi-use games area and redevelopment of the site to include erection of two five-storey buildings to provide 57 affordable residential units and a community room (Use Class D1) with associated bicycle parking, residential car parking, refuse storage, plant and outdoor private amenity space. Provision of a new shared street and enhancements to existing public open space (including new and improved children's play space and replacement multi-use games area) and associated landscaping and SuDS.") The proposed changes relate to the provision of replacement parking spaces and raised table crossing.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications and drawings detailed: 
Design and Access Statement (January 2020) by Arup; Planning Statement (February 2020) by Arup; Transport Statement (January 2020) by Arup; Flood Risk Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; London Sustainable Drainage Proforma v2019.02; Foul Sewage and Utilities Statement (February 2020) by Arup; Air Quality Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Noise and Vibration Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Health Impact Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Sunlight and Daylight Availability Report (February 2020) by Arup; Area Specialist Daylight Assessment (January 2020) by Arup; Sustainability Statement (February 2020) by Arup; Energy Statement (February 2020) by Arup; Ecological Impact Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Tree Survey and Arboricultural Report 181123-PD-21 (January 2020) by Tim Moya Associates; Fire Report (February 2020) by Arup; Archaeological Desk Based Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Preliminary Contamination Risk Assessment (February 2020) by Arup; Patmore Street Section 96A Planning Statement rev.2 (March 2023) by Arup, Cover letter (dated 02/04/2024) by Wandsworth Council Housing and Regeneration Department; PAE-PTE-VA-ZZ-DR-A-10101-P1 (Block A - GF & 1F); PAE-PTE-VA-ZZ-DR-A-10102-P1 (Block A - 2F & 3F); PAE-PTE-VA-ZZ-DR-A-10103-P2 (Block A - 4F & Roof); PAE-PTE-BC-00-DR-A-10100-P1 (Block B & C - GF); PAE-PTE-BC-01-DR-A-10101-P1 (Block B & C - 1F); PAE-PTE-BC-02-DR-A-10102-P1 (Block B & C - 2F); PAE-PTE-BC-03-DR-A-10103-P1 (Block B & C - 3F); PAE-PTE-BC-04-DR-A-10104-P1 (Block B & C - 4F); PAE-PTE-BC-05-DR-A-10105-P2 (Block B & C - Roof); PAE-PTE-ZZ-00-DR-A-10100-P1 (Site Plan - GF); PAE-PTE-ZZ-01-DR-A-10101-P1 (Site Plan - 1F); PAE-PTE-ZZ-02-DR-A-10102-P1 (Site Plan - 2F); PAE-PTE-ZZ-03-DR-A-10103-P1 (Site Plan - 3F); PAE-PTE-ZZ-04-DR-A-10104-P1 (Site Plan - 4F); PAE-PTE-ZZ-05-DR-A-10105-P1 (Site Plan - Roof); PAE-PTE-ZZ-XX-DR-A-10001-P1 (Si
